Questions.question: What is the best thing to do with old newspapers?
Questions.tip: Magazines, catalogs and other materials printed on similar paper should be recycled.

Questions.question: Should electronic wastes be recycled?
Questions.tip: In Australia There are many local collection programs for different types of e-wastes including electronic equipment

Questions.question: Should mobile phones or computers be recycled?
Questions.tip: In Australia There are many local collection programs for different types of e-wastes including electronic equipment

Questions.question: Should televisions be recycled?
Questions.tip: In Australia There are many local collection programs for different types of e-wastes including electronic equipment

Questions.question: Rechargeable batteries have up to 32 times less impact on the environment than disposable batteries
Questions.tip: Australians dispose of 270 million batteries a year. Apart from car batteries, most of these end up in landfill, which represents a waste of both valuable and rare resources.  It also increases the chances of toxins getting into the environment.
